thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com | 3 of 101
thread.title: Chantal Westerman

author: Chantal Westerman
title: Chantal Westerman
text: I love trust pilot because I trust trust pilot. It's that simple. I know when I go to you I can count on the review as being authentic and verified. I love doing reviews for you when I can, because I think people really do want to know who and what they are dealing with and they want to know the truth. More importantly they want the truth from real people. Just like me and for that matter, just like you.
